original_text:
Now the hand of the Lord is against you. You are going to be blind for a time, not even able to see the light of the sun.”
Immediately mist and darkness came over him, and he groped about, seeking someone to lead him by the hand.
korean_text: 보라 이제 주의 손이 네 위에 있으니 네가 맹인이 되어 얼마 동안 해를 보지 못하리라 하니 즉시 안개와 어둠이 그를 덮어 인도할 사람을 두루 구하는지라

sentences.original_text: Now hand of the Lord is against you.
You are going to be blind for a time,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 한 동안 눈이 멀게 되리니

sentences.original_text: not even able to see the light of the sun.
Immediately mist and darkness came over him,
seeking someone to lead him by the hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 손을 잡고 이끌어 줄 사람을 찾았다.
